attributes.additional_details: Simon Weston who fought in the Falklands war has been totally ignored by the Government. He has been raising money for charity and other causes and he is not even considered for this honour. If you are a business man, actor, civil servant you are obviously top of the tree when the honours come around. Come on Mr Cameron, get a grip on reality. Thank you.
attributes.background: Knighthood for Simon Weston. Falklands veteran and hero.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
